message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I believe a price of $2,300,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I understand the value of the product, I am only willing to pay up to $1,500,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't accept anything below $2,000,000 for this product. It holds significant value that I believe justifies this price. Are you open to reconsidering?
Alice, I appreciate your position, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to increase my offer beyond $1,500,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
